description: Winter's charm in Italy is enjoying hot espresso outdoors, sweat-free.
title: Espresso Winters
n_1: Luca shivers in Rome's chilly winter, craving warmth.
n_2: Marco suggests a café with outdoor seating.
c1_2: Outside? Really? Are you kidding me?
c2_2: Trust me, it's the Italian way.
n_3: They enjoy hot espressos outdoors, marveling at the lack of sweat.
c2_3: Told you, winter espresso is unmatched.
n_4: Laughing, they toast to Italian winters, embracing the cold with warmth in their hands.
